active_incidents.title: Some users may be experiencing issues loading DMs or channels

notes.body: We've confirmed that this issue is isolated to Slack in desktop. We continue to work on a fix and we're hoping to see signs of improvement shortly.
We've identified the issue and are working on a fix.  We're continuing to work on a fix and hoping to see signs of improvement shortly.

Some users may be experiencing issues loading DMs or channels, resulting in a blank screen. 

We're investigating and will post an update as soon as possible.
